text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, big broth— I mean, Trainer! G-Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, big sis— I mean, Trainer! G-Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A storybook. It's my favorite fairy 
tale, "The Blue Rose of Happiness".

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The story begins in a garden where many different colored 
roses grew. Anyone who visited it would find themselves 
filled with blessings and happiness.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
However, on a fateful day, a certain deep 
azure rose began to bloom in the garden…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Both the surrounding roses and curious visitors began to voice 
their doubts. "It's unsettling, that blue rose", they murmured, 
"It must be a flower of misfortune"…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Before long, the blue rose, too, began to see 
its own existence as meaningless and slowly 
withered under the weight of its misfortune…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but you see, the story doesn't end there! 
Before the blue rose wilts completely, a big 
brotherly figure appears.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but you see, the story doesn't end there! 
Before the blue rose wilts completely, a big 
sisterly figure appears.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's right! They were a kind-hearted person with a gentle 
smile. When they saw the blue rose, they immediately spoke 
out with a tender tone, wrapped in warmth and compassion.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"Look at the stunning blue color of this rose! 
One day it will surely bloom into a splendid flower! 
Please, allow me to purchase it!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"Look at the stunning blue color of this rose! 
One day it will surely bloom into a splendid flower! 
Please, allow me to purchase it!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And thus, the wilting blue rose found new life in a fresh pot. 
With daily tender nurture and encouragement from the kind, 
big-brotherly man, it had bloomed into a stunning flower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And thus, the wilting blue rose found new life in a fresh pot. 
With daily tender nurture and encouragement from the kind, 
big-sisterly woman, it had bloomed into a stunning flower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Perched gracefully on the windowsill, the blue rose found new 
meaning in life. Its vibrant hues extended a warm welcome 
to every passerby, filling them with joy and delight.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Perched gracefully on the windowsill, the blue rose found new 
meaning in life. Its vibrant hues extended a warm welcome 
to every passerby, filling them with joy and delight.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
……! Y-You think so too, Trainer?! 
Hehe, that makes me so happy…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… When I read this story for the first time, it became 
my childhood dream to become like the blue rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A blue rose capable of bringing happiness 
to everyone, not misfortune…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Around that time, my mother took me to a racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The racetrack was filled with people… It was 
so overwhelming to me, because I had always 
stayed at home trying not to bother anyone.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But, you know, that sight is still burned into my memory! 
Everyone around me was fully immersed in the race, looking 
toward the track with great big smiles.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And then, when the girl that everyone was cheering 
for won… all their faces lit up with pure joy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's when I thought to myself… 
I want to be like that, too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I didn't want to be a good-for-nothing who 
only brings misfortune, but the kind of horsegirl 
who can make everyone happy.
choice_data_list: I believe that you can pull it off.
I believe that you can pull it off.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Thank you! I'll make sure to work hard on my training!!

After that, Rice Shower continued to train 
diligently and push herself to the limit.
Until eventually, the time had come…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you said you had something important to say…?
choice_data_list: I've settled on your debut race!
I've settled on your debut race!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: D-Debut race?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Then… that means Rice will be racing soon……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, u-um…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I-It'll be okay. I won't repeat what 
happened with the Selection Race…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Especially now that I have you by my side…! 
… You can do it, Rice! You can do it, yeah～!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, this… this is a special spell my mother taught me. 
She told me that if I say these words, I'll have the power 
to do anything!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would you like to try it with me, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ……! Yeaaah～!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pffft… Ehehehe!!

Time passed by quickly as we racked up the training days 
in a cheerful mood. With our eyes firmly set on the debut race, 
we felt confident in our preparation to bring home victory!
…… At least, that's what I had thought.
On the day of the debut race ——

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There you are～! ! 
Hey, hey, aren't you Rice's trainer?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Alrighty! Let's head over to the Miho dooorms～!!
choice_data_list: Hold on a minute! What's going on?!
Hold on a minute! What's going on?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Weeell, you see, Rice has been playing hide and seek 
with everyone at the dorms since this morning!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Amazon and Bakushin and everyone else have 
been trying to find her this whole time! It looked 
like so much fun, so I also joined in～!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
And then I thought, "Could she be here…?", while peeking into 
an empty room far in the back, and found her. But then ——

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I heard a teeny tiny voice whispering "… Trainer" to herself!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking, maybe Rice wants you 
to find her and be like, "I found you～!"

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: So let's go! I'll lead the way!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Urara! Did you manage to find Rice? 
Wait a minute, hey! Why'd you bring a trainer over here?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You can't be planning to let them in, can you?! 
You know that trainers are strictly prohibited 
from entering the dormitory, yeah?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oops! I'm sorry! But Rice was calling out for her trainer…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
…… Ahh, whatever, you're hopeless! Just this 
one time, yeah!? I'll give you an exception on my 
authority as dormitory supervisor, so make it quick!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Okie! Thanks, Amazon!! 
This way, Trainer! Let's go!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Umm… knock, knock! Rice, are you in there?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Urara…? What are you doing here…?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hey umm, see? I brought your trainer 
along, just like you wanted～!
choice_data_list: Rice, I want to talk to you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer…!
